data.name: HtmlBeginWithCssStyles
data.value:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
    <style>
body, html {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    background-color: rgb(13, 1, 19); /* Medium purple background */
}

.container {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    margin: 2%;
}

.relation {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    align-items: left;
    justify-content: flex-start;
      margin-top: 5%;}

.main-image {
    width: 40%;
    height: 40%; /* Adjust as needed */
    object-fit: contain;
}

.header {
    color: #AEA3D8;
    font-size: 8vw;
}

table 
{ 
    width: 100%; 
    border-collapse: collapse; 
    text-align: center; 
}
        
                .matrix-table {
            margin-left: 5%;
            margin-right: 5%;
            border-collapse: separate;
            border-spacing: 0;
            width: 90%;
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .matrixTd {
            padding: 10px;
            color: #AEA3D8;
            border: 2px solid #2e2a33;
        }

        .left-top-corner-element {
            padding: 10px;
            border: 2px solid #2e2a33;
            color: #AEA3D8;
            border-top-left-radius: 10px;
        }

        .right-top-corner-element {
            padding: 10px;
            color: #AEA3D8;
            border: 2px solid #2e2a33;
            border-top-right-radius: 10px;
        }

        .left-bottom-corner-element {
            padding: 10px;
            color: #AEA3D8;
            border: 2px solid #2e2a33;
            border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
        }

        .right-bottom-corner-element {
            padding: 10px;
            color: #AEA3D8;
            border: 2px solid #2e2a33;
            border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
        }
        
td 
{ 
    height: fit-content;
    padding: 10px; 
    text-align: center;
    margin: 10px;
} 
.circle 
{ 
    width: 50px; 
    height: 50px; 
    background-color: #AEA3D8; 
    border-radius: 50%; 
    display: inline-block; 
    margin: auto;
} 
.innerCircle 
{ 
    width: 40px; 
    height: 40px; 
    background-color: #AEA3D8; 
    border-radius: 50%; 
    display: inline-block; 
    margin: auto;
} 

.arrow, .firstNode, .relationName, .secondNode
{ 
  width: 20vw; 
  color: #AEA3D8; margin-right: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    font-size: 2vw;
    font-weight: bold;
    transition: all 1s;
}

.arrow:hover, .firstNode:hover, .relationName:hover, .secondNode:hover
{
    color: #9370db;
}


.nodeItemGroup
{
    width: 40%;
    text-align: center;
}

.node
{
      height: 3vw;
    width: 3vw;}

.edge
{
    height: 40px;
        width: 10vw;
    object-fit: contain;
}

footer
{
 margin-top: 8%;  
   align-items: center;
}

.button 
{ 
    display: inline-block; 
    padding: 10px 20px; 
    margin: 20px; 
    background-color: #AEA3D8; 
    color: white; 
    text-align: center; 
    text-decoration: none; 
    border-radius: 15px; 
        font-size: 0.5vw; 
    cursor: pointer; 
    transition: all 1s;
}

.button:hover
{
    background-color: #9370db;; 
}

    </style>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>

              <style>
